definitions: distributed between members of a group

examples.text: a joint venture with shared profits

definitions: used, occupied, or enjoyed jointly with another or others

examples.text: the shared common area of the apartment complex

shortDefinitions: used jointly with another or others

definitions: possessed in common with another or others

examples.text: they have a shared interest in history

shortDefinitions: possessed in common with another or others

definitions: posted or reposted on a social media website or application

examples.text: you can set your privacy settings to check who is watching your shared content
she posted several captions under the shared photos

shortDefinitions: posted or reposted on social media
